Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder section of a buff pottery wine-jar, interior grooved, exterior covered with a light-brown slip and with remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text, now very faint.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393088) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393088)
